A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I call upon all 1 star reviewers to watch it a second time now that your preconceived notions have been obliterated. I hated it on opening night\, was about to rate it one star but decided to give it a second look anyway...and now\, with all expectations cleared away\, I saw what the non-Star Wars fan critics saw - it was a much more enjoyable experience with a clear head and from a different point of view.
